fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Consumers, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Any food, nutrition and health regulations, including REFIT of the General Food Law Regulation 178/2002.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
EFLA conference on the role of food trade agreements in the food sector, October 2015 
 
EFLA Workshop on Novel Foods, April 2016 
 
EFLA Congress on REFIT, September 2016 
 
EFLA Workshop on Country of Origin Labelling, February 2017 
 
EFLA Workshop on Processing Aids, June 2017 
 
EFLA conference on placing new food products on the market: A comparative analysis of the EU & US approaches, September 2017 
 
Publications: 
PRIVATE FOOD LAW (2011) 
 
FROM AGRICULTURAL TO FOOD LAW (2014)
goals__remit: EFLA's essential goal is to study and to promote food law, as well as to contribute to its development and to its international harmonisation, whilst taking into account the specificity of food law, its interdisciplinary nature and its special function, the protection of the consumers.
